travel_to_aether.title: Travel to The Aether
travel_to_aether.description: For this you need a portal of glowston lit with water. If you ever get lost, type /dimensions for tips

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: The Aether is a friendly looking skylands with some very manacing creatures. Since is above the overworld you can jump back home anytime.

30enemies_aether.title: Slay 30 Enemies in The Aether
30enemies_aether.description: Get a glimpse of what dangers to expect from the dimension.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Very good, now that you got used to the enemies around, it is time for you to search for stronger challanges.

place_aether_altar.title: Get an Altar
place_aether_altar.description: Find or craft an Altar to repair the damage on your items with Ambrosium Shards. Please place it on a surface.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: The altar repairs items, however there are surely more mystical items in this realm.

locate_aether_bronze_dungeon.title: Find a Bronze Dungeon
locate_aether_bronze_dungeon.description: Bronze Dungeons are hidden underground but they have an open exit.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Good. Your enemy lies in one of these chambers. Make sure you have a pickaxe around!

slay_slider.title: Slay The Slider
slay_slider.description: The Slider is probably just a big minable thing.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Every key opens something. Look around!

40combatlvl.title: Reach Combat Lvl 40
40combatlvl.description: Fight enemies to raise your combat level to at least 40.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Your combat skills are improving. Keep it up!

locate_aether_silver_dungeon.title: Find a Silver Dungeon
locate_aether_silver_dungeon.description: Silver Dungeons are big colloseums in the clouds. Big and Goldy, hard to miss.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: The Silver Dungeon is home of the Valkyrie Queen, but she may be harmed in fight only with specific requirments.

slay_10_valkyries.title: Slay 10 Valkyries
slay_10_valkyries.description: The Valkyries are submissive to their queen. You need their medals to trade with the Queen.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Good. Let`s hope you got enough to trade a fight with the Queen.

slay_valkyrie_queen.title: Slay The Valkyrie Queen
slay_valkyrie_queen.description: The Valkyrie Queen is a mythical being with many dodgy mechanics

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Every key opens something. Look around!

get_aether_backpack.title: Get an Aether Backpack
get_aether_backpack.description: Craft a Aether Backpack to carry even more items with you roadming the world.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Great! Did you knew you can upgrade your backpack to magnetize items towards you?

45combatlvl.title: Reach Combat Lvl 45
45combatlvl.description: Fight enemies to raise your combat level to at least 45.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Your combat skills are improving. Keep it up!

locate_aether_gold_dungeon.title: Find a Gold Dungeon
locate_aether_gold_dungeon.description: Gold Dungeons are bulky islands glued togather with many trees on top. However they all have a way of going in.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Incredible, a creature that harnessed the power of lava fully. Let`s hope you can face the fire.

slay_sun_spirit.title: Slay The Sun Spirit
slay_sun_spirit.description: The Sun Spirit is a master of fire. Make sure you can wistand it.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Impressive fight! Now don`t forget that every key opens something, so look around!

48combatlvl.title: Reach Combat Lvl 48
48combatlvl.description: Fight enemies to raise your combat level to at least 48.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Your combat skills are improving. Keep it up!

get_tier_4_power_up.title: Get Yourself a Stronger Powerup 4
get_tier_4_power_up.description: Powerups are armor trim materials that enhance your gear with various stats. Type /powerups to find out more about it

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Great! Apply those to your armor to become stronger!

locate_aether_platinum_dungeon.title: Find a Platinum Dungeon
locate_aether_platinum_dungeon.description: Platinum Dungeons are chunky towers up in the sky with a Whale roaming around.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Incredible construction. I wonder what loot could we get out of it.

slay_aerwhale_king.title: Slay The Aerwhale King
slay_aerwhale_king.description: The Aerwhale King is a nimble, yet silent trickster. Make sure to come prepared to the fight.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Incredible! Surely not everyone could face that king. It`s time to grow stronger

50combatlvl.title: Reach Combat Lvl 50
50combatlvl.description: Fight enemies to raise your combat level to at least 50.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Your combat skills are improving. Keep it up!

travel_aether_to_overworld.title: Travel back to the Overworld
travel_aether_to_overworld.description: Get back home as we need to find the next adventure.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Welcome back home, but adventure continues. The following dimension we shall visit is The Nether
